mapper.sql: USERS.ID USERS_ID, USERS.NAME USERS_NAME, USERS.PASSWORD USERS_PASSWORD, USERS.PHONE USERS_PHONE, USERS.WECHAT USERS_WECHAT, USERS.EMAIL USERS_EMAIL, USERS.INVITATION_CODE USERS_INVITATIONCODE, USERS.APPLIED_INVITATION_CODE USERS_APPLIEDINVITATIONCODE, USERS.REFERENCE USERS_REFERENCE, USERS.LAST_LOGIN_TIME USERS_LASTLOGINTIME, USERS.LAST_MODIFY_TIME USERS_LASTMODIFYTIME, USERS.CREATE_TIME USERS_CREATETIME, USERS.ENABLED USERS_ENABLED, USERS.DELETED USERS_DELETED, USERS.GENDER USERS_GENDER, USERS.BIRTHDAY USERS_BIRTHDAY, USERS.SCHOOL USERS_SCHOOL, USERS.MAJOR USERS_MAJOR, USERS.AVATAR_URL USERS_AVATARURL, USERS.CAREER_ID USERS_CAREERID, USERS.SCHOOL_ID USERS_SCHOOLID, USERS.LOCATION_ID USERS_LOCATIONID

mapper.update:
update USERS
NAME = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PASSWORD = #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PHONE = #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
WECHAT = #{wechat,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
EMAIL = #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
INVITATION_CODE = #{invitationCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
APPLIED_INVITATION_CODE = #{appliedInvitationCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
REFERENCE = #{reference,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
LAST_LOGIN_TIME = #{lastLoginTime,typeHandler=com.ishangke.edunav.dataaccess.typeHandler.CalendarTypeHandler},
LAST_MODIFY_TIME = #{lastModifyTime,typeHandler=com.ishangke.edunav.dataaccess.typeHandler.CalendarTypeHandler},
CREATE_TIME = #{createTime,typeHandler=com.ishangke.edunav.dataaccess.typeHandler.CalendarTypeHandler},
ENABLED = #{enabled,jdbcType=INTEGER},
GENDER = #{gender,jdbcType=INTEGER},
BIRTHDAY = #{birthday,typeHandler=com.ishangke.edunav.dataaccess.typeHandler.CalendarTypeHandler},
SCHOOL = #{school,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MAJOR = #{major,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
AVATAR_URL = #{avatarUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
GENDER = #{careerId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
GENDER = #{schoolId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
CAREER_ID = #{locationId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where ID = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select count(ID) from USERS where DELETED = 0

SELECT
from USERS where USERS.DELETED = 0 and USERS.PHONE = #{entity.phone, jdbcType=VARCHAR}

SELECT
from USERS where USERS.DELETED = 0 and USERS.REFERENCE = #{entity.reference, jdbcType=VARCHAR}
